name: Mineperger
description:
Mineperger is a game that grew out of frustration for the board game Afrikan Tähti, and the fact that the game puts on the appearance of having elements of strategy and decision making, when in reality it's mostly a game of chance.

Mineperger is like minesweeper, but it doesn't display the numbers on the board. It's fast paced and almost completely luck based, even though it appears visually very similar to the mostly skill based minesweeper it's mimicing.
